## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave togkmether content and kmkmkmkm code into a finished document. To learn gdfdfghhx about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Running Code

When you click thfsdafsdafsdfe **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like thdfasfis:

```{r}
1 + 1 + 3 + 4 +5 
2 + 2
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 * 2
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
